title: InDesign Underline frenzy
content:
Started a project on OSX Indesign CS3. Have prepared Paragraph Styles in advance, a month ago.  
Now, everytime, every PStyle is apllied, text appears underlined. Non of PStyles have underline checked in. Any idea, what went wrong here?
author: nikolajK

comments.content:
I only have CS2, but it should be the same. Click on the problem paragraph. If there is an asterisk next to the PStyle name, that means something is over riding it. Click on the triangle near the top of the palette. A pop-up menu should appear. Select Clear Overrides.

Otherwise, check to the actual PStyle to see if what, if any, Chararcter Styles are applied to it. If there are, then check those CStyles.

Hope that helps.

David

It helped, there was a mess with Character Styles imported with Word docs.

thx
